snippet: There was a fascinating cross section of wealth in New York at Jay-Z’s charity show at Carnegie Hall on Monday.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews charity concert by Jay-Z benefiting the United Way of New York City and the Shawn Carter Scholarship Foundation at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: There was a fascinating cross section of wealth in New York at Jay-Z’s charity show at Carnegie Hall on Monday.

headline.seo: Jay-Z Headlines a Concert at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: T-Shirts, Tuxes and Rap Without Frills
